content.query:
-- Create the AggWeather table
CREATE TABLE AggWeather (
    date NVARCHAR(100),
    avg_temp_C FLOAT, 
    avg_humidity FLOAT,
    avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT,
    weather_records BIGINT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggWeather
INSERT INTO AggWeather (date, avg_tempC, avg_humidity, avg_wind_speed, max_temp_F, min_temp_, weather_records)
SELECT 
    date,
    avg_temp_C, 
    avg_humidity,
    avg_wind_speed,
    max_temp_F,
    min_temp_F,
    weather_records
FROM 
    ExternalAggWeather
GO
